articles.content: When Harold Pinter was preparing to play the patriarch and ex-butcher Max in a 2007 radio production of his 1965 masterpiece The Homecoming, he was asked how he would know if hed nailed the part. If … [+2099 chars]

articles.title: Young Mungo by Douglas Stuart review – grit and longing in Glasgow - The Guardian
articles.description: Young love drives dreams of escape in this immersive follow-up to the Booker-winning Shuggie Bain
articles.content: Douglas Stuarts second novel appears hard on the heels of 2020s Shuggie Bain, a Booker prize winner with strong claims to instant-classic status, and is similar in a number of ways. Mungo Hamilton, l… [+5332 chars]
